module.name: Config Edit
module.changelog: *13.0.7* FREEPBX-11182 Allow deletion of custom files *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10282 allow creation of custom files *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10130 Allow viewing of read only files (non-custom) *13.0.4* Remove need for Usermanager *13.0.3* Resize properly to browser window. Don't expand into the infinite *13.0.2* Made navigation easier to understand *13.0.1* Inital release with support for editing custom.conf files.
